nodes.text: The Elite Circle was the leading group of assassins in the Assassin's Guild. To get into this elite group, a sentient had to be voted in by his, her, or its peers. Members of the Circle were assigned special, large-scale missions, killing targets at the request of "big customers."

During his feud with the Guild, the gunslinger Gallandro killed over half of the Circle's membership, as well as many lower-level members of the Guild. The survivors offered Gallandro a position with the Guild in response; though Gallandro refused the offer, the feud did end at that point.
Han Solo and the Corporate Sector Sourcebook uses the term Inner Circle instead—a term which usually refers to the Imperial Ruling Council.
